channel.title: Writing Contest #1
channel.description:
[b]The First Moparisthebest Writing Contest!![/b]
[i]For those of you who love to write. [/i] [b]Topic[/b] -Summer Vacation 2006
[b]Rules[/b] You must write this essay. Your entree must [b]not[/b] be premade. Have no more than 5 Paragraphs. Must have a good Title. Must have an Introduction and Conclusion. You have 1 week to enter this essay.
Voting will be on a second thread.
Good luck!

item.title: Writing Contest #1
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

The First Moparisthebest Writing Contest!!

For those of you who love to write.

Topic -Summer Vacation 2006

Rules
You must write this essay.
Your entree must not be premade.
Have no more than 5 Paragraphs.
Must have a good Title.
Must have an Introduction and Conclusion.
You have 1 week to enter this essay.

Voting will be on a second thread.

Good luck!
